cards.rules_text:
If Leygate of Anticipation is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
You may cast spells as though they had flash.

If Leygate of Transformation is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
As Leygate of Transformation enters, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control are the chosen type in addition to their other types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.

If Leygate of Annihilation is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
Spells you cast have deathtouch and lifelink.

If Leygate of Innovation is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
Whenever you tap an artifact for mana, add {U}.

If Leygate of Trickery is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
Whenever a spell becomes the target of a spell or ability, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

Choose a nonland card type. Target opponent discards a card of the chosen type or reveals their hand with no cards of the chosen type.
Flashback—Exile a black card from your hand. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

Exile target creature. Its controller creates a 2/2 colorless Follower creature token.
Flashback—Exile a white card from your hand. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

Put ten stun counters on target permanent.
Flashback—Exile a blue card from your hand. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

R03 Echo of Destruction deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of creatures.
Flashback—Exile a red card from your hand. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]

Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
Flashback—Exile a green card from your hand. [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
Mill three cards.

Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} equal to that spell's mana value.
At the beginning of your next main phase, you lose the game unless you exile a blue card from your hand and pay 1 life.

Destroy target artifact or enchantment. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} equal to that permanent's mana value.
At the beginning of your next main phase, you lose the game unless you exile a white card from your hand and pay 1 life.

Destroy target creature. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} equal to that creature's mana value.
At the beginning of your next main phase, you lose the game unless you exile a black card from your hand and pay 1 life.

Copy target spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} equal to that spell's mana value.
At the beginning of your next main phase, you lose the game unless you exile a red card from your hand and pay 1 life.

Search your library for a green creature card. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} equal to that card's mana value.
At the beginning of your next main phase, you lose the game unless you exile a green card from your hand and pay 1 life.

Flash
When Unity Incarnate enters, destroy all creatures with power 3 or greater.
Evoke—Discard a white card or exile three white cards from your graveyard. [i](You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)[/i]

Flash
When Filtration Incarnate enters, counter target activated ability, non-evoke triggered ability, or noncreature spell.
Evoke—Discard a blue card or exile three blue cards from your graveyard. [i](You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)[/i]

Flash
When Heritage Incarnate enters, search your deck for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Evoke—Discard a black card or exile three black cards from your graveyard. [i](You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)[/i]

Flash
When Freedom Incarnate enters, change the targets of target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability.
Evoke—Discard a red card or exile three red cards from your graveyard. [i](You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)[/i]

Flash
When Restoration Incarnate enters, return up to two target green cards not discarded this turn from your graveyard to your hand.
Evoke—Discard a green card or exile three green cards from your graveyard. [i](You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)[/i]

Flash
When Void Incarnate enters, target player sacrifices a permanent.
Evoke—Discard a colorless card or exile three colorless cards from your graveyard. [i](You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters.)[/i]

You may sacrifice a nontoken white permanent rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. Until end of turn, spells cost {1} more to cast.

You may sacrifice a nontoken blue permanent rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws four cards.

You may sacrifice a nontoken black permanent rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Target player loses 6 life unless they sacrifice two permanents or discard two cards.

You may sacrifice a nontoken red permanent rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
R04 Flare of Chaos deals 3 or X damage, whichever is greater, to target creature or player, where X is the total mana value of permanent's you've sacrificed this turn.

You may sacrifice a nontoken green permanent rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Choose one —
• Counter all activated and triggered abilities.
• Exile all graveyards.

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Cognitive Symbiote. Create a 0/1 blue Figment creature token with decayed and “Whenever this token attacks and isn't blocked, draw a card.” [i](It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
As long as there are five or more counters on Cognitive Symbiote, it's a 0/0 Eye artifact creature with flying.

Decayed [i](This creature can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
Whenever this token attacks and isn't blocked, draw a card.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life for each tick counter on The Clock Tomb.
{T}: Put a tick counter on L17 The Clock Tomb. Add {C} for each tick counter on it.
{T}: Add {R}{W}.
Draw two cards, then discard a card.
Reveal the top three cards of your deck. An opponent chooses a nonland card from among them. Put that card on the bottom of your deck and the rest into your hand.

Choose one —
• Search your deck for a land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
• Draw a card. You gain 1 life.
Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws five cards. Each player may put any number of land cards from their hand onto the battlefield.

If Leygate of Mirrors is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
The “legend rule” doesn't apply to permanents you control.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

Destroy all creatures.
Cycling {W} [i]({W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)[/i]
When you cycle W07 Reverberating Wrath, exile up to two target cards from graveyards.
When Pocket Void enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls with mana value 3 or less until Pocket Void leaves the battlefield.

Madness {0} [i](If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
Vantara Resplendent can't use loyalty abilities if it was cast this turn.
[+1]: Target creature can't attack or block until the start of your next turn.
[-6]: Destroy all creatures.

cards.rules_text2:
Whenever Vantara Dormant attacks, investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.”)[/i]
When you cast your second spell in a turn, if it's not your turn, exile Vantara Dormant, then return her to the battlefield under your control.

cards.rules_text: {2}, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.

[-6]: Draw six cards.

cards.rules_text2:
Whenever Agelor Dormant attacks, scry 2.
When you cast your second noncreature spell in a turn, exile Agelor Dormant, then return him to the battlefield under your control.

Whenever Dothrok Dormant attacks, put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
When a creature dies, if it's the second creature that's died this turn, exile Dothrok Dormant, then return him to the battlefield under your control.

Whenever Volia Dormant attacks, add {C}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.
Whenever you control six or more colorless permanents, exile Volia Dormant, then return her to the battlefield under your control.
